subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[clan]]; [[family]] [[clan]]; [[tribe]]
# [[ethnic group]]; [[nationality]]
# [[group]] or [[class]] of things with common features
# {{lb|zh|historical}} to [[impose]] a [[death penalty]] on an [[offender]] and his [[entire]] [[family]], and even on the [[families]] of his [[mother]] and [[wife]]
